text: Eden is a small unincorporated community in Atchison County, Kansas, United States. It is about 5 miles west and 5 miles north of Atchison. It lies at the present-day intersection of Labette Rd, 322nd Rd, and 326th Rd. ==History== A post office was opened in Eden in 1858, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1900. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Unincorporated communities in Kansas Category:Unincorporated communities in Atchison County, Kansas Category:1858 establishments in Kansas Territory
title: Eden, Kansas
